trans-unit.source: DSC Script Resource
trans-unit.target: DSC Script Resource

trans-unit.source: Applies To: Windows PowerShell 4.0, Windows PowerShell 5.0
trans-unit.target: Applies To: Windows PowerShell 4.0, Windows PowerShell 5.0

trans-unit.source: The Script resource in Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) provides a mechanism to run Windows PowerShell script blocks on target nodes.
trans-unit.target: The Script resource in Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) provides a mechanism to run Windows PowerShell script blocks on target nodes.

trans-unit.source: Syntax
trans-unit.target: Syntax

trans-unit.source: Properties
trans-unit.target: Properties

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: GetScript
trans-unit.target: GetScript

trans-unit.source: Provides a block of Windows PowerShell script that runs when you invoke the <link><linkText>Get-DscConfiguration</linkText><title></title></link> cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: Provides a block of Windows PowerShell script that runs when you invoke the <link><linkText>Get-DscConfiguration</linkText><title></title></link> cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: This block must return a hash table.
trans-unit.target: This block must return a hash table.

trans-unit.source: SetScript
trans-unit.target: SetScript

trans-unit.source: Provides a block of Windows PowerShell script.
trans-unit.target: Provides a block of Windows PowerShell script.

trans-unit.source: When you invoke the Start-DscConfiguration cmdlet, the TestScript block runs first.
trans-unit.target: When you invoke the Start-DscConfiguration cmdlet, the TestScript block runs first.

trans-unit.source: If the TestScript block returns $false, the SetScript block will run.
trans-unit.target: If the TestScript block returns $false, the SetScript block will run.

trans-unit.source: If the TestScript block returns $true, the SetScript block will not run.
trans-unit.target: If the TestScript block returns $true, the SetScript block will not run.

trans-unit.source: TestScript
trans-unit.target: TestScript

trans-unit.source: Provides a block of Windows PowerShell script.
trans-unit.target: Provides a block of Windows PowerShell script.

trans-unit.source: When you invoke the <link><linkText>Start-DscConfiguration</linkText><title></title></link> cmdlet, this block runs.
trans-unit.target: When you invoke the <link><linkText>Start-DscConfiguration</linkText><title></title></link> cmdlet, this block runs.

trans-unit.source: If it returns $false, the SetScript block will run.
trans-unit.target: If it returns $false, the SetScript block will run.

trans-unit.source: If it returns $true, the SetScript block will not run.
trans-unit.target: If it returns $true, the SetScript block will not run.

trans-unit.source: The TestScript block also runs when you invoke the Test-DscConfiguration cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: The TestScript block also runs when you invoke the Test-DscConfiguration cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: However, in this case, the SetScript block will not run, no matter what value the TestScript block returns.
trans-unit.target: However, in this case, the SetScript block will not run, no matter what value the TestScript block returns.

trans-unit.source: The TestScript block must return True if the actual configuration matches the current desired state configuration, and False if it does not match.
trans-unit.target: The TestScript block must return True if the actual configuration matches the current desired state configuration, and False if it does not match.

trans-unit.source: (The current desired state configuration is the last configuration enacted on the node that is using DSC.)
trans-unit.target: (The current desired state configuration is the last configuration enacted on the node that is using DSC.)

trans-unit.source: Credential
trans-unit.target: Credential

trans-unit.source: Indicates the credentials to use for running this script, if credentials are required.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the credentials to use for running this script, if credentials are required.

trans-unit.source: DependsOn
trans-unit.target: DependsOn

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the configuration of another resource must run before this resource is configured.
trans-unit.target: Indicates that the configuration of another resource must run before this resource is configured.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the ID of the resource configuration script block that you want to run first is ResourceName and its type is ResourceType, the syntax for using this property is DependsOn = "[ResourceType]ResourceName".
trans-unit.target: For example, if the ID of the resource configuration script block that you want to run first is ResourceName and its type is ResourceType, the syntax for using this property is DependsOn = "[ResourceType]ResourceName".

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: Example
